channel.title: Cant connect to server properly
channel.description:
[code]Exion Client Initialized, revision # 317 Error: T1 - 226,0 - 114,249 Error: T1 - 32,0 - 226,114 Error: T1 - 233,0 - 187,32 Error: T1 - 188,0 - 233,187 Error: T1 - 236,0 - 218,188 Error: T1 - 172,0 - 236,218 Error: T1 - 247,0 - 172,236 Error: T1 - 222,0 - 253,121 Error: T1 - 148,0 - 222,253 Error: T1 - 144,0 - 148,222 Error: T1 - 158,0 - 249,144 Error: T1 - 220,0 - 158,249 Error: T1 - 236,0 - 220,158 Error: T1 - 216,0 - 236,220 Error: T1 - 88,0 - 216,236 Error: T1 - 69,0 - 88,216 Error: T1 - 223,0 - 69,88 Error: T1 - 23,0 - 248,187 Error: T1 - 15,0 - 73,23 Error: T1 - 125,0 - 106,15 Error: T1 - 198,0 - 125,106 Error: T1 - 245,0 - 198,125 Error: T2 - 101,245,198 - 2,0,0 - 15,39, Error: T1 - 231,0 - 101,245 Error: T1 - 228,0 - 231,101 Error: T1 - 157,0 - 228,231 Error: T1 - 235,0 - 157,228 Error: T1 - 145,0 - 235,157 Error: T2 - 72,145,235 - 2,0,0 - 82,-113, Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8211 at TextDrawingArea.method384(TextDrawingArea.java:99) at TextDrawingArea.drawText(TextDrawingArea.java:71) at client.drawChatArea(client.java:206) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8185) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8903) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4689) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
When i try to connect, it logs in, but then the error comes and it messes up. Note: Doesnt fully login, just to the point it shows the chatbox & some interface of a shop that isn't suppose to be there.
